title: AMAZING N8N WORKFLOW BUILDER NEEDED FOR 7 FIG ECOMMERCE BRAND
salary: Everywhere from 7-15$ per hour depending on task
job_overview:
Amazing n8n workflow builder (experienced with both n8n and coding) wanted for 7 figure ecom brand

Hey there,

My team and I are looking for a new team member to join our amazing 7-figure eCommerce dropshipping business team.

Currently we are in need of someone that is responsible for the most important task of this business, Ai systems.
It's essential that you are experienced with n8n, coding and ai.

Its imperative that you have exensive knowledge in both n8n and coding as the workflows needs to fullfil our needs fully, this is the type of tasks you would get:
Website product automation. We have a template, we need to automate the replacing of text, colors and images in this template to create a product testing machine.
Automation of sending information between google drive folders and sheets.
Automation of notifications in master excel sheet.
And much much more. 

Please read the model template below for all the information that we expect, such as Role, Responsibilities, Results and Requirements. Explanation vacancy text:



PRODUCT DESCRIPTION WRITER

Department: 
Ai Systyem Specialists

Reports To: 
CEO

ROLE
Building automated systems that successfully automates our system more and more on a daily basis. You’re the person that is responsible for a very important part of the 
You ensure that both the code and overall workflow is accurate and well made.
You ensure the task is instructions is followed to preserve the intended purpose of the workflow.
You make sure the new workflows hold up quality and function.

RESPONSIBILITIES
Ensuring that the finished workflow is fully operational and does exactly what we asked for.
Having a good grammar and spelling.
Maintaining a certain benchmark that is created by the Process Manager.
Knowing how to work with n8n, code, google sheets, and html.
Knowing where to find the CEO and have close contact with his requirements, discussing and working together to successfully create the workflows he is looking for. 
Understands that the CEO often knows many of the programs needed to use and what they can do but doesnt have alot of knowledge in coding, this is where you need to successfully fill the gap fully!

RESULTS
Being able to build smaller workflows in less than one day.
Being able to build medium workflows in less than 3 days.
Being able to build larger workflows in less than 5 days.
Making sure all the work is finished within a certain time frame
Following the guidelines and instructions!
Learning the guidelines fully!
Thinking along with the CEO and Process Manager to fully understand what you are building.
Improving yourself and the results everyday.

Remember and use the codeword "apple" when introducing yourself to us for the first time. This way we know that you read this post and is motivated to work with us specifically.
